Name: Zombie Mansion
About the game: Zombie Mansion is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter with puzzle and exploration elements. You woke up in a mansion full of animated corpses, you have to find a way out. The mansion consists of many floors of corridors and rooms, in order to get out you need to find keys and solve simple riddles. Find new weapons, ammunition and first aid kits. The deeper into the mansion, the more and stronger the zombies and the more intricate locations. 15 levels 4 types of zombies 3 weapons 4 types of keys and doors
